# GET /v1/subscriptionOfferCodes/{id}/relationships/customCodes | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/subscriptionOfferCodes/{id}/relationships/customCodes ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionOfferCodes-_id_-relationships-customCodes)

-  GET /v1/subscriptionOfferCodes/{id}/relationships/customCodes 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/subscriptionOfferCodes/{id}/relationships/customCodes

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionOfferCodes-_id_-relationships-customCodes#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/subscriptionOfferCodes/{id}/relationships/customCodes
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionOfferCodes-_id_-relationships-customCodes#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionOfferCodes-_id_-relationships-customCodes#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionOfferCodes-_id_-relationships-customCodes#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[SubscriptionOfferCodeCustomCodesLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/subscriptionoffercodecustomcodeslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionOfferCodes-_id_-relationships-customCodes#see-also)

### [Managing Custom Offer Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionOfferCodes-_id_-relationships-customCodes#Managing-Custom-Offer-Codes)

[`Create Custom Offer Codes`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/post-v1-subscriptionoffercodecustomcodes)Create custom offer codes for an auto-renewable subscription offer.[`List All Custom Offer Codes for an Auto-Renewable Subscription`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-subscriptionoffercodes-_id_-customcodes)Get details about a custom code for a specific subscription offer for an auto-renewable subscription.[`Read Custom Offer Code Information`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-subscriptionoffercodecustomcodes-_id_)Get details about a specific offer code for an auto-renewable subscription.[`Deactivate Custom Offer Codes`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/patch-v1-subscriptionoffercodecustomcodes-_id_)Deactivate a batch of custom offer codes for an auto-renewable subscription.
